epss_options_menu_desc: Extra Profiles and Skill Sets mod options.
epss_total_profiles_desc: Total number of profiles (including base game profiles). Click "Save" to confirm changes.
epss_commit_settings_desc: Click to confirm changes to number of profiles, otherwise they will be discarded.
epss_autobind_skills_desc: When switching to a profile, the corresponding skill set will be automatically equipped if available.
epss_allow_fewer_desc: Reduce the number of profiles and skill sets to below what is available in the base game.
epss_dialog_autobind:
Autobind skill sets is active. Available skill sets are bound to the corresponding profile and cannot be changed.

Disable autobind in the options menu to reassign skill sets manually.
epss_dialog_number_profiles: You have selected $new_num profiles. You currently have $old_num profiles.
epss_dialog_saved: Number of profiles updated. Restart your game for changes to take effect.
